text: Stephen Gaskin (February 16, 1935 - July 1, 2014) was an American counterculture hippie icon. He was best known for co-founding "The Farm", a famous spiritual intentional community. He was also known for being in the Haight-Ashbury district of San Francisco, California in the 1960s. Gaskin was born in Denver, Colorado. He was married to Ina May Gaskin. He had five children. He was in the US Marine Corps from 1952 to 1955. Gaskin died on July 1, 2014 in Summertown, Tennessee. He was 79. ==References== ==Other websites== * Stephen Gaskin at The Farm official website Category:1935 births Category:2014 deaths Category:American activists Category:Nonviolence advocates Category:Writers from Denver Category:Writers from San Francisco Category:Writers from Tennessee
title: Stephen Gaskin
